project_plan.name: Weather Information Fetcher in Python
project_plan.description: Develop a Python program that interfaces with a public API to fetch and display current weather information for a specified city.

task.name: Set up the project structure and install necessary libraries (e.g., requests).
Implement functionality to fetch current weather data from the public API for a given city.
Parse the API response to extract temperature, humidity, and weather conditions.
Display the fetched weather information (temperature, humidity, conditions) in the terminal.
Write tests to ensure that the API fetching and parsing functionalities work as expected.
Execute tests on all implemented features to confirm that they function correctly.
